original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, When a man or woman shall commit any sin that men commit, to do a trespass against the Lord, and that person be guilty;
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 이르라 남자나 여자나 사람들이 범하는 죄를 범하여 여호와께 거역함으로 죄를 지으면

sentences.original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel,
When a man or woman shall commit any sin
sentences.korean_translation: 남자나 여자가 어떤 죄를 범할 때

sentences.original_text: to do a trespass against the Lord,
